website_summaries.verdict: Holds its air well, and buyers say that it does a good job of simulating a real gym floor workout.
pros: Color options here are blue, black, or pink
Accessories include an electric pump, a duffel storage bag, and a patch kit
Bounces like a professional gym floor
cons: Some buyers say this option can arrive with a small leak around the valve

customer_reviews.title: Professional competitive mat bounce!
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT PURCHASE!! I purchased this mat for my 12 year old Level 6 gymnasts who CONTINUES TUMBLING at home even after hours at the gym! Now she can safely continue to practice her gymnastic skills at home on a floor that bounces like her competitive floor! It arrived this week and she had it out of the box and inflated in a few minutes! There are quite a few mats out there to pick from but we are VERY PLEASED with the quality and the bounce this mat provides! Her gymnastics friends that have tried it and agree "great for practicing skills"!
customer_reviews.author: J Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Inflated quickly and has held it’s shape through hours of gymnastics tumbling and just plain bouncing! It is almost like an indoor trampoline. My 8 year old, all of her friends and my teenagers love it! It has the rebound of a true tumbling floor. Keeps my gymnast safe while practicing at home. This is a great product. Best of all, I can deflate it and store it away easily in it’s own small duffel bag.
customer_reviews.author: David Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a sturdy mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air track for my daughter so she could practice some of her floor excersices and flips. She loves it and although we have only had it for approximately a week, it seems to be doing great.
customer_reviews.author: michelle zaidi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! My granddaughter has done competitive cheer for 12 years and this mat allows her practice around her busy schedule at home instead of the gym. Incredibly well made; inflates very quickly. Very nice and durable duffel bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: This air track mat is fantastic and all that we hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up, and takes less than a minute to inflate. It also stayed inflated while my kids used it all day and tumbled on it. My daughter tumbles for cheerleading and usually her wrists hurt, but the mat was so soft and helped with the pain and she didn't even complain about her wrists. This is a great mat to have at home and easy to take it with you as its very transportable. It is a great value for your money because it is made well and very high quality. We love our new air track!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The quality is amazing. Set up was so quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about three weeks now. My boys have jumped and jumped. The quality is amazing. Set up was so quick and easy. I coach gymnastics and it's a great teaching tool. I especially like it for leaps and jumps. It's also great for learning higher level beam skills. Several of my students have it and they can safely practice their skills at home. It's perfect for back tucks and handsprings. If you are trying to figure out which air mat to buy, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 gymnast daughters who love this. It l is a super fun air track! Super sturdy and was easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Squires

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE it!! The customer service has been amazing. We got it right on time. My daughter set it up immediately and has had a blast tumbling with all of her friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Bart J. Brockbank

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy you can’t do anything with this it’s tiny, needless to say a very disappointed child on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: CAC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better products I've purchased for my children's tumbling practice. It is of great quality and perfect for their current needs. The seller/manufacturer also appears quite conscientious and invested in customer satisfaction. Highly recommended among the many similar products I considered.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent R. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great tumble mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tumble track. My daughter loves it. Great customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: JenJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful this was a good product but I was wrong. It loses air within an hour and already has cracks in the track. My kid only ways 60lbs. I just checked and I can’t evem return it!! Don’t purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Jordan

customer_reviews.title: good edea
customer_reviews.text: come with a hole and had to patch on Christmas Eve...
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is constantly flipping and jumping in the house. She loves the feel of this as it more closely replicates the Mats at her gym. I’ll be buying a 2nd Mat to have one outside and one inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wes J

customer_reviews.title: Gymtastic!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered exactly as advertised. Excellent customer service when my daughter lost parts. Thank you Bryan!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited about a week after getting our mat to write a review to test it out and I am very pleased to say we love it!! My 8 year old daughter is a gymnast and has used it daily to practice her skills at home. My other kids have had fun on it too and after lots of usage over the week it is still just as sturdy as day one. The inflatable mat came in a bag, nicely rolled up and was very easy to set up. It comes with a great pump and even has a patch kit if ever necessary. It is well made and my gymnast {and 3 other kids} love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Hold the air we’ll and is exactly what my daughter needed to practice her tumbling skills without the bounce you get from a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Quality product as described. Seller was very prompt in emails and answering any questions. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to set up. My daughter absolutely loves her tumble track!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I looked in picture and was no electric pump so no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this AirTrack is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sinolodo Air track and a different brand air track. The Sinolodo AirTrack was by far a better quality! I am a former gymnast and Cirque performer. I still like to work out and teach circus, tumbling, & yoga. The mat is excellent! The pump and accessories are also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE THIS MAT!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchases this last week for my 8 year old, level 4 gymnast. It has been an absolute hit! We were able to quickly and easily inflate it...she hasn’t stopped tumbling on it since! We even took it with us for a weekend getaway to a hotel. It folds and stores very easily. This has been a great purchase and i love knowing how much safer it is for her to tumble at home!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: Received the mat yesterday aired it up and it has a slow leak around the valve where it meets the mat. It is exactly what we wanted except for the leak.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Condition and use of product
customer_reviews.text: I just received my product in the mail it came in perfect condition! All of the supplies that comes with the air track are easy to use. The air track itself is great material and I look forward to using it a lot more! As of now I have found nothing wrong with the product and I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a air track.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Marseo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted and fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my 12 yr old daughter the 20 ft and it is perfect size for doing roundoff back handsprings and other tumbling. It has held up perfectly and made well my daughter loves it and is exactly what she wanted!! It was fast shipping too, I didn’t think my daughter was going to get it in time for her birthday since I ordered it on a Monday night and we got it on that Thursday!! Definitely recommend this product and seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it sooo much! It has great bounce, it’s about 4 1/2 inches thick and it’s great for tumbling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yamilet Campos

customer_reviews.title: Air Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great air mat. My girls love it!!! Thanks for getting it to them so quickly!!!
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! And great a Customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and better customer service! This is how companies should run....they stand behind their product and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fox

product_meta.title: Gymtastic Professional Inflatable Air Track
product_meta.description: BEST AIR TRACKS ON AMAZON Gymtastic understands how important it is that each product performs perfectly. Gymnasts work extremely hard each day, pushing their limits, in order to stick it! In order to perform perfectly, your gymnast needs to be able to practice perfectly. To promote perfect practice, we give you our UNCONDITIONAL guarantee that any air track you purchase will meet all of our rigorous standards. Otherwise, we will replace the unit or offer you a 100% refund. BENEFITS OF USING AN AIR TRACK BY GYMTASTIC Easy set up and take down (under 5 minutes), allowing your gymnast to practice anytime, anywhere. Protects against injury by providing the perfect surface to practice on. Sizes for all different skill levels! Learning your first back tuck? Opt for the small air track! Going for a round off backhand spring? We recommend the 10ft. For the most advanced gymnasts, the 16ft or 20ft tracks give extra distance, allowing your gymnast to link more moves together WHY CHOOSE GYMTASTIC­? In everything we do, we believe in inspiring excellence. We believe in pushing our limits. We do this by creating beautiful products that are easy to use, mimic competition settings, make it safe to practice anytime, anywhere. Being active is an important part of daily health and we want to give you the tools to safely participate in activities such as gymnastics. As a family run business, we believe in going 110% for our customers. Let's work together to help our gymnasts work hard, train safe, and have fun! WHAT’S INCLUDED - Air Track - Carry Duffle Bag - Electric Pump With All Sizes Except (Foot Pump for Smallest Size 1M x .6M x 10cm) + Air Track Valve Adapter - Valve Tightening Tool *Patch kit no longer included in Amazon orders. Contact us to have one shipped for free.
feature_bullets: 🇺🇸 USA BASED - HIGH QUALITY & 1 Year Warranty: When you receive your product go watch this youtube video https://bit.ly/2MGyENe to get oriented with your new Air Track. Next, be sure to register your product to take advantage of the Gymtastic 1 Year Full Warranty.

💵 MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We guarantee you and your gymnast will LOVE this product. We are so confident, that if you aren't happy with the Tumbling Track, we will send you a new mat or give you a FULL REFUND

👜 INCLUDES PUMP AND DUFFEL BAG: Every air track includes a duffel bag for easy transportation and storage as well as an electric pump (for the 10ft and larger air tracks) or foot pump (for the air boards).

🤸 PRACTICE SAFELY & 🏅IMPROVE GYMNASTICS RANK: Every gymnast DREAMS of getting to Rank 7 and beyond. The Gymtastic Air Mat is the one of the best tools for cheerleaders and gymnasts to use for home practice

😍 EASY TO STORE & SIMPLE 1 MINUTE SET UP: Tired of gymnastic equipment that takes up your ENTIRE garage storage? Don’t worry! The Gymtastic tumble track air mat deflates and folds up into a convenient duffel storage bag. This makes it easy to store in a cupboard, closet, or under most beds. Additionally, set up only takes 1-2 minutes!
